org.deidentifier.arx

Class ARXConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deidentifier.arx.ARXConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ARXConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    A generic configuration for the ARX anonymizer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int REQUIREMENT_COUNTER
      Do the criteria require a counter per equivalence class
      static int REQUIREMENT_DISTRIBUTION
      Do the criteria require distributions of sensitive values in the equivalence classes
      static int REQUIREMENT_SECONDARY_COUNTER
      Do the criteria require a second counter

      • getCriteriaAsArray

        public PrivacyCriterion[] getCriteriaAsArray()
        Returns all criteria (except k-anonymity) as an array. Only used internally. If k-anonymity is included the minimal group size should be obtained and enforced
        Returns:

      • getCriterion

        public <T extends PrivacyCriterion> T getCriterion(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Returns an instance of the class, if any. Throws an exception if more than one such criterion exists.
        Parameters:
        clazz -
        Returns:

      • getMetric

        public Metric<?> getMetric()
        Returns the metric used for measuring information loss
        Returns:

      • getMinimalGroupSize

        public int getMinimalGroupSize()
        Returns the minimal size of an equivalence class induced by the contained criteria.
        Returns:
        If k-anonymity is contained, k is returned. If l-diversity is contained, l is returned. If both are contained max(k,l) is returned. Otherwise, Integer.MAX_VALUE is returned.

      • getRequirements
